name: World Robot Fighting: Boxing C
description:
World Robot Fighting: Boxing Cup is the best robot games, fight with your iron punches, and make the difference, in this free games, you can fight with the best robots fighters.
Features:
Incredible 3D fight, real wrestling!
You'll be a robot fighter!
HD sound Listen to the electronic effects!
6 different scenarios Win fights in all!
Incredible combos. Punches, kicks, steel, boxing robot!
